docs.snippet: Masahiro Tanaka, like Hideki Matsui 11 years earlier, made his major league debut in a road game against the Blue Jays, creating similar excitement among Japanese fans and news media members....
docs.lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka, like Hideki Matsui 11 years earlier, made his major league debut in a road game against the Blue Jays, creating similar excitement among Japanese fans and news media members.

headline.main: Buzz From Tokyo to Toronto Evokes Another Yankee Debut

docs.snippet: The Yankees’ Masahiro Tanaka struck out eight and walked none. Only five pitchers since 1914 had been able to match or better those totals in their major league debuts....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ Masahiro Tanaka struck out eight and walked none. Only five pitchers since 1914 had been able to match or better those totals in their major league debuts.
docs.abstract: Benjamin Hoffman Keeping Score column argues that Masahiro Tanaka's first start with the New York Yankees marks an elite debut, despite shaky beginning; notes that only five pitchers since 1914 have been able to match or better Tanaka's totals during a debut.

headline.main: Rough Start Aside, an Elite Debut
headline.print_headline: Rough Start Aside, an Elite Debut

docs.snippet: Upon further review, Ian Desmond’s inside-the-park homer was changed to a ground-rule double, and that helped Atlanta pull out a 2-1 win over the Nationals....
docs.lead_paragraph: Upon further review, Ian Desmond’s inside-the-park homer was changed to a ground-rule double, and that helped Atlanta pull out a 2-1 win over the Nationals.
docs.abstract: MLB Roundup; Atlanta Braves beat Washington Nationals, 2-1, after benefiting from decision that overturns inside-the-park home run; other basketball news noted.

docs.snippet: After giving up a home run in the first inning, Masahiro Tanaka found his rhythm and helped the Yankees to a 7-3 victory over the Toronto Blue Jays....
docs.lead_paragraph: After giving up a home run in the first inning, Masahiro Tanaka found his rhythm and helped the Yankees to a 7-3 victory over the Toronto Blue Jays.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees beat Toronto Blue Jays, 7-3; Yankees starter Masahiro Tanaka pitches seven innings in his debut with team, finding his rhythm after shaky start.

headline.main: Rocked at Start, Tanaka Finds Rhythm and Lifts Yankees to Win
headline.print_headline: Rocked at Start, Tanaka Finds a Rhythm

docs.abstract: New York Mets beat Cincinnati Reds, 4-3, in first win of the season; Mets name Lucas Duda as starting first baseman.
